description: This file defines the main layout component for a React application, including the top navigation bar, sidebar, date range selector, and routing outlet. It manages UI elements and navigation interactions for the app.

methods.name: GlobalDateSelector
methods.description: A React component that renders a date range picker and dispatches updates to the global store when the date range changes.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Main layout component that includes navigation, sidebar, and outlet for nested routes.
